## Publication

```{r pubByYear, fig.width=6, fig.height=3}
pubmed_wide <- read_csv("data/2022-06-PubMed-by-Year.csv")
pubmed <- pubmed_wide %>%
  pivot_longer(cols=c("causal drug discovery",
                      "machine learning drug discovery",
                      "artificial intelligence drug discovery"))
ggplot(pubmed, aes(x=Year, y=value, color=name, group=name)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_path() +
  xlim(1990, 2022)
```
